Text:
In case you want to share this torrent with a friend, I have made an easy to remember shortened magnet link:

mgnet.me/.Turtles2012

You can jot this down or read it over the phone & your friends get a simple unobtrusive page with a single magnet link at the top.  No NSFW ads, no bull, just straight to this file.  I do this with most of my favorite torrents.

Thank you for downloading.
Share and Enjoy!
